summary.span: 提供支持在单个容器中存储多个数据对象的类。

span.span: Provides classes that support storage of multiple data objects in a single container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是一个抽象类，可用于将对象组织成定义的物理格式的单个实体，以实现可移植性和高效访问。 is an abstract class that can be used to organize objects into a single entity of a defined physical format for portability and efficient access. ZIP 文件是的主要物理格式 。A ZIP file is the primary physical format for the . 其他 实现可能使用其他物理格式，如 XML 文档、数据库或 Web 服务。Other implementations might use other physical formats such as an XML document, a database, or Web service. 与文件系统类似，中包含的项 将在文件夹和文件的层次结构中引用。Like a file system, items contained in a are referenced in a hierarchical organization of folders and files. 尽管 是抽象类，但 方法使用派生类作为默认值 。Although is an abstract class, the derived class is used as default by the method. （"Part"）是表示存储在中的对象的抽象类 。A ("part") is the abstract class that represents an object that is stored in a . （"关系"）定义源 对象或目标对象之间的关联 。A ("relationship") defines an association between a source or and a target object. 可以是以下两种类型之一，其中每种类型可以为以下两种形式之一：A can be one of two types, each of which can be one of two forms: - 包级别关系（由创建 ）Package-level relationship (created by ) - 包中的和目标部分之间。Between a and a target part in the package. - 与包外部的目标资源之间的。Between a and a target resource outside the package. - 部分级别关系（由创建 ）Part-level relationship (created by ) - 在源和包中的另一个目标部分之间。Between a source and another target part in the package. - 源 和目标资源在包外。Between a source and a target resource outside the package. 关系的源 或源 被视为关系的 "所有者"。The relationship's source or source is considered the "owner" of the relationship. 删除源对象时，还将删除源对象所拥有的所有关系。When the source object is deleted, all the relationships owned by the source object are also deleted. 创建或删除关系的过程不会以任何方式以物理方式更改源对象或目标对象。The process of creating or deleting a relationship does not physically change either the source or target objects in any way. （"数字签名"）是部件和关系的组合，表示包含在中的数字签名 。A ("digital signature") is a composition of parts and relationships representing a digital signature included with a . 数字签名标识发信方，并验证中包含的签名部分和关系 是否未被修改。The digital signature identifies the originator and validates that the signed parts and relationships contained in the have not been modified. 包还支持数字 Rights Management （DRM），这允许 使用向授权用户授予的特定访问权限对中的内容元素进行加密。Packages also support Digital Rights Management (DRM), which allows content elements in a to be encrypted with specific access rights granted to authorized users. 基于 体系结构， 是一种用于基于 Open [XML 纸张规范（XPS）](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)存储文档的包类型。Based on the architecture, an is a package type designed for storing documents based on the open [XML Paper Specification (XPS)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761). 默认情况下，Windows Presentation Foundation 使用包来存储页面和文档的内容、资源和关系。Windows Presentation Foundation uses packages to store content, resources, and relationships for pages and documents using a standard ZIP file by default. 与任何 ZIP 文件一样，应用程序可以使用 类来存储和选择在单个有效访问权限容器中保护任何类型或数量的数据文件。As with any ZIP file, your application can use the classes to store and optionally protect any type or number of data files in a single efficient-to-access container. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 硬件开发人员中心](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)的 XPS 部分的开放打包约定（OPC）规范。For more information, see the Open Packaging Conventions (OPC) specification, available for download at the XPS section of [Windows Hardware Developer Central](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
